Class
Description
AbstractInvoker<T>
AbstractInvoker, which can be used for all invokers
CipherFacility
Class for encryption and decryption contains methods for encryption and decryption
DeletePasswordFileOperation
command for deleting password file
IDataSourceLayer
Interface for Data Source Layer can be used to add new data source contains method to save and load data
IPasswordPolicy
interface for password policy
can be used to add new password policy
contains method to get strength of password
+ Decorator Pattern is used here to add new password policy
ISubscriber
interface for subscriber
can be used to add new subscriber
contains method to get selection
main function is to check password for fraud
+ Observer Pattern is used here to add new subscriber
LoggerFactoryService
hier werden die Methoden von LoggerRepoService implementiert (Service Layer) + hier wird Singleton Pattern angewendet

LoggerRepoFactory
Factory von LoggerRepo

Hier werden die Methoden von LoggerRepo implementiert (Service Layer)

MasterPasswordRepository
MasterPasswordRepository contains methods to read and write master password
MultipleFilesDataLayer
Class for multiple files data source implements IDataSourceLayer contains methods for CRUD operations from different files
PasswordContainsNumbers
class for password contains numbers implements IPasswordPolicy R4
PasswordContainsSpecialChar
class for password contains special character implements IPasswordPolicy R2
PasswordContainsUpperChar
password contains upper char implements IPasswordPolicy R1
PasswordFileOperation
interface for password file operation + Command Pattern is used
PasswordFileOperationExecutor
Invoker for PasswordFileOperation
PasswordFileOperationService
receiver for password file operation
just a wrapper for data layer to be used by command pattern
PasswordFileOperationServiceBuilder
this is a builder for PasswordFileOperationService
+Builder Pattern is used here to create PasswordFileOperationService
can be used like this:
PasswordInfo
PasswordInfo contains password and strength
PasswordLength
class for password length policy implements IPasswordPolicy R3
PasswordPolicyFactory

PasswordResetSubscriber
WrongPasswordSubscriber implements ISubscriber it is a subscriber for the reset password

ValidateWith
custom annotation for validation + this is the annotation Pattern for the custom annotation ValidateWith unfortunately it is not used in the project, since we do not want to have spring in the project
therefore we have commented out the code, we just want to show that we know how to use it
Validator<T>
object which implements this interface can be used for validation
WrongPasswordSubscriber
